name: Space Poller
description:
Space Poller originated as a student project and will now continue its journey.

Shoot charging waves of aliens with your deadly rainbow bullets while flying around in outer space.

Currently, Space Poller is in a prototype stage where gameplay will drastically change as new ideas and features come up. Some of the stuff we want to experiment with are:

  • Levels / maps
  • Loot
  • Skills and character upgrade progression

Note that a controller is currently required to play Space Poller. Keyboard and Mouse support is in developement.
